title: Solution of a separable differential equation

content.description: A student attempted to solve the differential equation <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4037@</annotation> </semantics> </math> with initial condition <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG5bGaeyypa0JaaGOmaaaa@3BBB@</annotation> </semantics> </math> when <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaGimaaaa@3BB8@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. In which step, if any, does an error first appear?
content.question: Step 1: <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <mo>∫</mo> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mi>y</mi> </mfrac> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>d</mi> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <mo>∫</mo> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4892@</annotation> </semantics> </math> Step 2: <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>ln</mi> <mrow> <mo>|</mo> <mi>y</mi> <mo>|</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo> <mi>C</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44E8@</annotation> </semantics> </math> Step 3: <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>|</mo> <mi>y</mi> <mo>|</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>/</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mi>C</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44AB@</annotation> </semantics> </math> Step 4: Since <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG5bGaeyypa0JaaGOmaaaa@3BBB@</annotation> </semantics> </math> when <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaGimaaaa@3BB8@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mo>=</mo> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mi>C</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E81@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. Step 5: <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>/</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@417C@</annotation> </semantics> </math>

choices.label: There is no error in the solution.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables
